name: GetGoogleAccessibleAccounts
description:
Retrieve accessible Google accounts for integration.

This tool retrieves a list of Google accounts accessible through a specified integration in a Datadog project. It should be called when you need to access or verify Google account integrations for a specific project. The tool returns the accessible accounts related to the integration.

parameters.name: integration_id
parameters.description: A unique integer identifying the specific integration.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this integration.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve this ID by making a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this integration.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this integration.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
